keel.Algorithms.Fuzzy_Rule_Learning.Genetic.ClassifierSLAVE

Class example_set

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Fuzzy_Rule_Learning.Genetic.ClassifierSLAVE.example_set

  • public class example_set
extends java.lang.Object

    Encodes a set of examples (including information about if the example is covered by a rule, the coverage degree, ...).

    Since:
    JDK 1.6

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Written by Francisco José Berlanga (University of Jaén) 01/01/2007

      static double MISSING
      Encodes a set of examples (including information about if the example is covered by a rule, the coverage degree, ...)

        tama - int Number of examples to be marked

      • Mark

        public void Mark(int[] v,
                 int tama,
                 double[] grado)

        Marks the examples in "v" as covered and set their coverage degree to the one in "grado"

        Parameters:
        v - int[] Positions of the examples to be marked in the set of examples
        tama - int Number of examples to be marked
        grado - double[] The coverage degrees for the examples to be marked
